e stupendo soltanto che ci sono delle cose strane sul gioco 
mille bug

This game is currently in a broke state and this game is impossible to enjoy on a casual level. If you want to play killer just know you got everything in the world stacked against you (as this game is survivor stacked no matter what any survivor main tell you) , you might do good for a while you wont once you hit rank 10 or above because at this point your against the most toxic players and will relentlessly run into abused mechanics. If your a killer that relies on the basic attack to kill good luck winning on a large map, good luck winning at all.

I remember a time when this game used to be fun now its only fun playing survivor because you do stupid shit and it can be funny at times and enjoy the game even if you die repeatedly and still manage to rank up because it loves to hold your hand as a survivor. 

Killer is just a stressful experience and no fun at all.

Alright, I've had enough for now.

At this time, My buddy and I have officially uninstalled the game.  We MAY reinstall it in the future and try again, but until the developers of this game get their act together and actually fix the problems we still continue to have since late last year this game is just no longer fun.

The thing is; some bugs are worst for others than on me.  For the most part (and probably because I have a current up-to-date rig to play HD games like these) I only experience some of these bugs from time to time that hindering my inputs from happening right away to 2-3 second delays.  And most of the jumping glitches is usually because of the Killer's server.

But there is no excuse...NO F***ING EXCUSE; when we KNOW there are plenty of people online still playing the game, for LOBBY MATCHMAKING to take times from 10 to 30 MINUTES OR MORE.  I know there are plenty of people out there playing the Killers and others still just as survivors.  Why is it taking over 30 mins at times to get a damn game going?  How are we supposed to be having any fun playing your game developers when you have a shody Lobby Matchmaking still present?

Sorry; your new bells and whislters for new killers, survivors, maps, and perks can't save your game right now.  Stability and Reliablity needs to be your key concern or else you are going to get more players like us dropping out and uninstalling completely.

So yes; I do NOT Recommend buying this game in its current Feb 27th 2017 state.  Until we hear matchmaking times have improved and most notorious of bugs have finally been eliminated maybe we will give it a chance again.  But save your money until then.

Peace DbD; I'm out.

*Wild Tabby wanders away from the horror show*

If you want to play this game be prepared for long wait times

The game is either extremely fun or extremely frustrating, based on who you play with and how many bugs you encounter per round. Dead by Daylight is not beginner friendly, but it's also not difficult to master the mechanics once you have some game knowledge. That said, the average skill level is extremely low, and most players just rely on the few overpowered items to succeed.

The developers have no idea what they're doing, but there are still some decent people playing the game. I wouldn't advise joining the game this late into its lifespan, which surely can't go on much longer, but I also can't convince myself to quit.

I got my money's worth, that's for sure, despite all the pain along the way.

HATREDY

So where do I begin with this game?....
Honestly the game is in such a bad state currently but it has a lot of fun times. The bad times currently out weight the good times for the most part. The game itself isn't the bad part but the community is. The Devs are trying to fix it but every patch is like a Rollercoaster for the simple fact that with each Patch something good may come but a lot of random bugs come that takes months to fix in the long run. The game is also losing it's player base more and more each day. Around October 2016 the game had a good 40,000 players but the number since then due to bad patches and unfixed bugs has dropped the game to 3,500-12,000 players depending on the time you play. If you're Russian, playing in Russia, you should find quite a lot of games. Maybe even come across Putin a couple times. But if you playin an NA region, the wait times can vary between 2 minutes to 20 minutes. If you're playing with Friends it could even take an hour at times to get a game. The game's idea and the mechanics are great but the Devs have a lot of work to make the game good again.

Edit: Adding to this. With the Release of Bill from Left 4 Dead it's added some slight replay to the game but honestly not much. The game has just become worse of time and regionlock might be the only answer to some of the problems the game has due to people in California getting paired with people from Russia. Which means lag will be a big factor in that game.

Edit Part 2: So Legion released and it caused a shit storm in the game of bugs and angry survivor players. The community has not got any better since I originally posted this. I've also played another 400 hours of this game for the mere fact that a lot of friends play it. The game is solid with friends still but the bad still outweighs the good entirely at times and just makes the game a hassle to play. I'm gonna leave it on not recommended but will come back and update eventually to see if maybe things are better.

When i bought this game it was very boring game. Look at this:
1. Boring gameplay. If u killer, u need to kill, but it`s not will be so easy; If you Survivor, u need to escape. Oh nice game. This every this repeats every game, changing only the killer and place. But with lags it becomes even harder
2. When i bought no was cards. But now the developers have added. Oh thanks god. But better to purchase these cards separately, but not a  game.
3. New Killers, oh nice and? New maps? Thats all? Fix lags? Thanks, but no.

In 2018 maybe u can buy this game, not right now. 

If you bought this game, please accept my condolences and return the money before it's too late

Hass-Liebe

Die Spiel-Idee ist mega klasse. Keine Frage, man muss es m√∂gen, aber bei welchem Spiel ist das nicht so?
Ich bin seit Anfang an mit dabei und habe die ganzen Entwicklungen vom Spiel bis heute mitbekommen und es hat sich einiges sowohl gebessert, als auch in meinen Augen verschlechtert.

Vorne weg will ich gleich sagen, das einzig negative sind haupts√§chlich die laggs/bugs und die Camper bzw egoistischen Teammates inGame - aber die gibt es nunmal √ºberall - ist irre nervig, wenn du online allein spielst und dich drauf verlassen musst, deswegen empfehle ich, spielt MINDESTENS mit einer Person, die ihr kennt, am besten auf TS, wo man sich absprechen kann =) Am meisten macht es nat√ºrlich Spa√ü, wenn man zu 5 ist und abwechselnd Killer spielt. - ist auch zu 4 cool ;) dann sind es eben nur 3 Survs aber trotzdem fair play- grade f√ºr Leute, die neu im Spiel sind, empfehle ich mit Freunden sich einzufinden, weil online einfach zu viele Arschis rumlaufen ;)

Alles zu erkl√§ren, wie das Spiel funktioniert, w√§re unn√∂tig, deswegen schreibe ich es nicht. Wie man richtig spielt, findet man sowieso am besten W√ÑHREND des Spiels raus. Es gibt auch keinen perfekten Spieler, also macht euch selbst nicht schlecht, wenn ihr es nicht instant drauf habt. Ich spiele zum Beispiel auch total gern mit Anf√§ngern, weil es f√ºr mich mehr auf den Spa√ü ankommt :) - deswegen:
Online Spielen funktioniert, macht aber auf Dauer irgendwann kein Spa√ü, wenn du immer das Los ziehst, dass du mit Idioten spielst, die dir nicht helfen oder Killer, die dich abcampen und es irgendwie fast nicht m√∂glich ist zu entkommen. ABER du musst auch verlieren k√∂nnen =) vergiss das nicht!

Im Gro√üen und ganzen kann ich sagen, dass das Spiel mich zwar schon oft zur Wei√üglut gebracht hat, weil es wie gesagt unterschiedliche Spieler gibt, die unterschiedliche Meinungn √ºber ''fair play'' haben - aber ich das Spiel einfach immer total gern mit Freunden spiele, weil es mich einfach so oft schon zum √ºbelsten lachflash gepackt hat. 
Wenn du dir nicht sicher bist ob du das Spiel kaufen willst, schau dir die LP's von Gronkh an - die ersten, das war damals mein entscheidender Grund, warum ich das Spiel so unbedingt haben wollte ;)

Eine Hass-Liebe, auf die ich einfach momentan nicht verzichten kann ^^

Ps.: Die DLC muss man nicht kaufen - ist eig. haupts√§chlich f√ºr die Leute, die in das Spiel so vernarrt sind und neue Sachen gerne dazu haben wollen, es ist ja auch immer beschrieben, was das DLC mitbringt, also denkt nicht, dass das Spiel dich zum Kauf verpflichtet, du kannst dann nur nicht mit bestimmten Charakteren oder Killern spielen, trotzdem kannst du gegen sie oder mit ihnene zsm spielen =) Also keine Panik schieben, das Spiel greift nicht ohne deine Erlaubnis in dein Portmonee ;)
